title: Leslie Jordan, ‘Will & Grace’ Actor and Instagram Star, Dies at 67
description: Shows like “Will & Grace” made him a familiar face, then the pandemic brought new fame. He was killed in a car crash in Hollywood.
dc:creator: Neil Genzlinger
media:credit: Chris Haston/NBC Universal via Getty Images
media:description: Leslie Jordan, center, in a scene from the hit sitcom “Will & Grace.” He won an Emmy as the tart-tongued socialite Beverley Leslie.
